title: Floaters: Our Reflection in the Rio Grande
description:
Migrant children are drowning at the border, their deaths met with indifference. Rescue workers call these bodies “floaters.”

The post Floaters: Our Reflection in the Rio Grande appeared first on The Intercept.

title: U.S. Spy Agency Dreams of Surveillance Underwear It’s Calling “SMART ePANTS”
description:
The Office of the Director of National Intelligence is throwing $22 million in taxpayer money at developing clothing that records audio, video, and location data.

The post U.S. Spy Agency Dreams of Surveillance Underwear It’s Calling “SMART ePANTS” appeared first on The Intercept.
